name: Crushing Force
description:
Your blows land with such force that even a single strike can cripple your foe.

Whenever you roll the maximum on one or more damage dice for a melee attack, you may inflict Injury on your target.

improvements.name: Beheading
improvements.description: When you inflict Injury on a foe, if the Injury causes them to become Twice Helpless, their head is severed or crushed, as appropriate for your weapon. Their Endurance is immediately reduced to 0.
